summary: Save just before finishing legendary dragon.
descriptionHtml:
As title says, save of few arrows to get 'Legend' achievement.
<br />I really didn't feel like farming levels to get to 80, so I cheated my way and slayed the beast. I'm uploading this file, because I read people had trouble with finding Legendary Dragons. (took me 3 spots)
<br />My game is rather heavily modded, but it should work. If not, PM me.Â 
<br />
<br />
<br />Of course, Dragonborn (or even maybe rest of) DLC required.
author: KingGrimm
